title: [Large-Scale] ICT Integration Strategies for Early Childhood Education: Developing Pre-Service Teacher Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational early childhood education theory and general pedagogy knowledge
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service teachers to learn practical strategies for effectively utilizing ICT in early childhood education. It explores real classroom applications through a qualitative phenomenological approach, emphasizing feasibility in resource-constrained technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply selection criteria for ICT tools appropriate to early childhood developmental stages
Learners can practice designing early childhood education activities using smartphone-based digital content
Learners can analyze pedagogical and technical issues arising from ICT integration through a phenomenological approach and propose alternatives
Learners can evaluate ICT application cases in early childhood education settings using qualitative research methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
